job.title: Electrical Test Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: <strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>Under general supervision, designs, develops and tests electrical and/or electronics hardware and/or firmware for downhole tools and surface systems. This may include analog and digital circuitry, power transmission and distribution, signal and communication systems, mechatronic systems. </li><li>Diagnoses instruments and electrical and/or electronic systems problems. Services, troubleshoots, repairs and/or replaces and maintains instrument and electrical and/or electronics component levels in surface and downhole equipment. </li><li>May perform analytical troubleshooting, repair and maintenance of electrical and/or electronic systems. </li><li>May be required to develop, test and debug firmware for Microprocessor/ Microcontroller/ DSP system and software for test system automation. </li><li>Evaluates, selects and applies standard engineering techniques, procedures and criteria, using judgement in making minor adaptations and modifications. </li><li>May develop specifications, conduct process study, research investigations, and report preparation. </li><li>Provide technical guidance to designers/drafters and less experience engineers as required. May provide technical leadership in developing solutions and/or devising new approaches to problems encountered </li><li>Incorporates reliability analysis during the design and test process. </li><li>Complies with HSE and Service Quality requirements. </li><li>Job tasks, correctly performed, impact indirectly on cost containment, efficiency, profitability, or operations. </li><li>Skills typically acquired through the completion of an undergraduate degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering or similar discipline, and 4 years of related experience </li><li>Design knowledge / Product development is very important </li><li>New Product Development environment with knowledge of testing procedure </li><li>Hardware Testing experience is most important </li><li>Validate smaller circuitry </li><li>Knowledge of following tools is good to have </li><li>PCB- Altium ( should understand `` </li><li>Software Test Automation- Labview </li><li>Firmware knowledge <br></li></ul><strong>You can apply via: http://jobd.info/?id=DSrCKf<br><br></strong><strong><u>Recruiter Details<br><br></u></strong><strong>Praveen Rao<br><br></strong>(302) 214-0551<br><br>praveen_us@falconsmartit.com<br><br>Find all current job openings at our Career Page<br><br>https://www.falconsmartit.com/FalconCareer.html<br><br>Follow us on LinkedIn for Job Opportunities<br><br>https://www.linkedin.com/company/falconsmartit/
